'''Land of Plenty's Sentinel''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Land of Plenty's Sentinel is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|Atocpan}} after defeating a Hilichurl camp:
* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Blazing Axe Mitachurl;Hilichurl*2;Hilichurl Berserker;Pyro Hilichurl Shooter}}
* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Thunderhelm Lawachurl;Hilichurl;Hilichurl Shooter*2}}
